name: Devopssquare.GitHub.io
body:
# Devops Square

This site is about practicing devops by devops principles, e.g., providing a Continuous Delivery Platform by Continuous Delivery. It will contain samples, articles, and show cases.

However, we will start everything in _German_ (probably some content will later be translated to English).

# Impressum

  Gerd Aschemann

  Lilienthalstr. 9

  64347 Griesheim

  +49 173 3264070

  info@devopssquare.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
